website_summaries.verdict: Offers some versatility of use and good grip for the price.
pros: Head can be used as a hammer
Well-machined jaws have the bite to take a good amount of torque

customer_reviews.title: Solid pipe wrench and value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Irwin usually makes nice products, and this one is no different. Solid with great aesthetics and feel. So far it's a pipe wrench, but one that should last. Nothing else to say.
customer_reviews.author: CrankTop Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: Does its job for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it just to unscrew a single plumbing fixture because I refuse to hire a "professional" for anything so simple, but I'm sure I'll use it more because I had frequent issues with needing a bigger wrench before I bought this one and my landlord is terribly negligent.
customer_reviews.author: StarCrashr

customer_reviews.title: good tool that the company stands behind
customer_reviews.text: Built well and Irwin is a good choice in my book after dealing with them personally they honor their lifetime warranty and shipped me a free replacement for another type of pipe wrench at not cost.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: It's not to small or overly large and heavy like a lot of pipe wrenches are
customer_reviews.text: This has been a handy little sucker. This is the right size pipe wrench for around the house. I've used it for several projects. It's not to small or overly large and heavy like a lot of pipe wrenches are. Would recommend for around the house. Good quality made as well.
customer_reviews.author: D.Markin

customer_reviews.title: Different-ish
customer_reviews.text: Very different from the picture and the packaging was bizarrely underwhelming. It's definitely a pipe wrench though, and it works so it gets 4 stars from me. I'd recommend it. P.S.- It's not different enough to suspect it is counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality tool, just what I expected. Have used it several times, easy to use one handed & doesn't slip like a cheaper wrench.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Better.
customer_reviews.text: Work fine, well made, a welcome addition to my growing collection of hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: Earl S. Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: This wrench is exactly what I wanted. It is heavy, but the jaws operate smoothly. You can feel the weight of the unit as soon as you use it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Berrenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and feeling tool. Oh, and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: nora garcia

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW
customer_reviews.text: Saved me a lot of money by not needing a plumber. This thing is a beast and will move almost anything!! thank you other reviewers for letting me give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: still holding up great after years of abuse
customer_reviews.text: high quality and work just as good as they did 3 years ago when i purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: this is what my handy husband wanted for working on our house and was just what he expected, great price
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wrench
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this one. Heavy cast iron and virtually nothing that can break. Teeth have sharp grip and have worked flawlessly so far.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sacks

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: nice wrench, I am just a homeowner but I needed to get a few pipe wrenches when tackling some plumbing jobs. Settled on this one and a 10 inch one as well. The wrench has good power and appears to be sturdy, hopefully I'll be handing this thing off to my children one day.
customer_reviews.author: Markie Twain

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: I don't own many tools but ever since I bought this wrench I've felt the itch and have wanted to buy more tools. It's very solid and seems like it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: The Irwin 274102 pipe wrench is well made and offers a great value. Does the job it was designed to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: F. Disla

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool
customer_reviews.text: A fist rate tool. Dies sharp and handle clean of burs. Well made product I would buy again. But owning tools like this I doubt anyone would need to purchase again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Oilwelldoctor

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Wrench!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very happy. I am a small woman, however I had no problem using this pipe wrench. It is heavy, however I liked the extra weight so I did not have to work harder! :)
customer_reviews.author: B.Kolar

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but overall a good tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well, but holy hell does this thing make your hands smell like cancer. Seriously, just touching it for a second means you will need to scrub your hands for two minutes to feel clean again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Wrench I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I've used and abused this wrench and it can take it. It has the best feel to it than any other wrench has. Other plumbers have used this wrench and ran out and got one right away because nothing else compares to it. I switched completely form Rigid to Irwin and I have been much happier.
customer_reviews.author: T. Goodwin

product_meta.title: IRWIN Tools VISE-GRIP Pipe Wrench, Cast Iron, 2-Inch Jaw, 14-Inch Length (274102)
product_meta.description:
Heavy-duty drop-forged cast iron housing is heat-treated to resist distortion or breakage. Hardened teeth provide tremendous bit. Easy-spin adjusting nut is heat-treated for durability. The I-beam handle's wide design provides excellent weight distribution. Unique "hammer head" design provides a flat surface for hammering. IRWIN Tools VISE-GRIP Pipe Wrench, Cast Iron, 2-Inch Jaw, 14-Inch Length (274102)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Constructed from the highest grade cast iron, forged and heat treated to ensure maximum durability. Unique hammer head design provides a flat surface for hammering. Easy-spin adjusting nut is heat-treated for durability. Wide I-beam handle design provides better weight distribution. Drop-forged jaw is heat-treated to resist distortion or breakage. Hardened teeth provide tremendous bite. Housing constructed of heavy-duty cast iron.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty drop-forged cast iron housing is heat-treated to resist distortion or breakage.
Hardened teeth provide tremendous bit. Easy-spin adjusting nut is heat-treated for durability.
The I-beam handle's wide design provides excellent weight distribution.
Unique "hammer head" design provides a flat surface for hammering.
